meanings.definition: A form of poetry consisting of eight lines with a specific rhyme scheme.
meanings.sent1: In English class, we learned about triolets and their unique structure.
meanings.sent2: The poet wrote beautiful triolets that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The triolets at the poetry slam were so clever, they made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her triolets were like colorful puzzles, each line fitting perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The triolets danced off the page, painting vivid images in our minds.

meanings.definition: A group of three people or things.
meanings.sent1: The triolets of friends went on a picnic together.
meanings.sent2: There were three triolets waiting at the bus stop.
meanings.sent3: The triolets of cupcakes on the table disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The triolets of trees in the park stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The triolets of stars in the sky twinkled brightly on a clear night.
